description: This Java class is a Spring Boot REST controller providing utility endpoints such as service info, health check, and documentation redirect.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller defining utility endpoints for service info, health checks, and Swagger UI redirection.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message to indicate the service is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation, preserving original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating service health status.
